Name: Legends from Lacoytas: The First Seeker
About the game: Legends from Lacoytas: The First Seeker is a challenging top down shooter where you are given a crossbow and sword to shoot and slash your way through unique enemies. Features Challenging combat that requires players to constantly adapt based on their available weapons and the current enemies. At least 4 normal enemies. At least 4 bosses. A short story focused mode in which you will save a village from local bandits and can learn more about the protagonist. An endless mode where you will fight infinite waves of randomly selected enemies. What's the highest score you can achieve? An overpowered floor.
